main event: A sighting of bright objects believed to be ECHO satellites over the Pacific Ocean on January 29, 1964.
interesting points: The objects were observed for a duration of 9 minutes,They appeared very bright with high fading glows,The objects were seen moving at a speed of two per minute,The objects were thought to be ECHO satellites although later evaluated as an unknown flight,The sighting took place at a specific coordinate in the Pacific Ocean.
